title: Awesome List Updates on Oct 16, 2022

items.title: Awesome Eslint
items.content_text:
### Plugins / Misc

*   [Misc (‚≠ê11)](https://github.com/ilyub/eslint-plugin-misc) - Miscellaneous rules including rules for creating custom checks and wrapping (modifying) third-party rules.

### Plugins / Practices and Specific ES Features

*   [eslint-plugin-hexagonal-architecture (‚≠ê308)](https://github.com/CodelyTV/eslint-plugin-hexagonal-architecture) - A plugin that helps you to enforce hexagonal architecture best practices.
items.content_html:
Plugins / Misc

  • Misc (‚≠ê11) - Miscellaneous rules including rules for creating custom checks and wrapping (modifying) third-party rules.

Plugins / Practices and Specific ES Features

  • eslint-plugin-hexagonal-architecture (‚≠ê308) - A plugin that helps you to enforce hexagonal architecture best practices.

items.title: Awesome Elm
items.content_text:
### Podcasts / Miscellaneous videos

*   [Elm Town](https://elmtown.github.io/) - A podcast about the people in the Elm community (Outdated).

### Code generators / Individual Podcast episodes

*   [Elm Bridge (‚≠ê104)](https://github.com/agrafix/elm-bridge) - Generate Elm types from Haskell
*   [Elm CodeGen (‚≠ê140)](https://github.com/mdgriffith/elm-codegen) - Generate Elm code
*   [elm-gql (‚≠ê69)](https://github.com/vendrinc/elm-gql) - Generate GraphQl client code from GraphQL queries
*   [elm-graphql (‚≠ê781)](https://github.com/dillonkearns/elm-graphql) - Generate GraphQl client code from GraphQL schemas
*   [HTML to Elm](http://mbylstra.github.io/html-to-elm/) - Convert HTML to Elm Html. Useful when porting an app to Elm.
*   [JSON Schema to Elm (‚≠ê90)](https://github.com/dragonwasrobot/json-schema-to-elm) - Generates Elm types, JSON decoders, JSON encoders and fuzz tests from JSON schema specifications
*   [OpenApi Generator (‚≠ê24k)](https://github.com/OpenAPITools/openapi-generator) - Generate OpenApi types for Elm.
*   [Quicktype (‚≠ê13k)](https://github.com/quicktype/quicktype) - Generate JSON decoders and encoders from JSON
*   [Travelm Agency (‚≠ê47)](https://github.com/andreasewering/travelm-agency) - Generate typesafe Elm code from translation files

### Frameworks / Outdated Boilerplates

*   [elm-spa](https://www.elm-spa.dev/) - Framework for making single page apps in Elm.
*   [Elm Land](https://elm.land/) - A framework for building Elm applications.
*   [Spades (‚≠ê299)](https://github.com/rogeriochaves/spades) - Start an Elm SPA ready to the real world.

### Compile and bundle / Outdated Boilerplates

*   [elm-compiler (‚≠ê7.7k)](https://github.com/elm/compiler) - The official Elm compiler.
*   [elm-webpack-loader (‚≠ê534)](https://github.com/elm-community/elm-webpack-loader) - Webpack loader Elm.
*   [Parcel](https://parceljs.org/languages/elm/) - Bundle Elm using Parcel.
*   [vite-plugin-elm (‚≠ê209)](https://github.com/hmsk/vite-plugin-elm) - Vite plugin for Elm.

### Community and Support / Games

*   [Slack](https://elm-lang.org/community/slack) - Elm slack community.
items.content_html:
Podcasts / Miscellaneous videos

  • Elm Town - A podcast about the people in the Elm community (Outdated).

Code generators / Individual Podcast episodes

  • Elm Bridge (‚≠ê104) - Generate Elm types from Haskell
  • Elm CodeGen (‚≠ê140) - Generate Elm code
  • elm-gql (‚≠ê69) - Generate GraphQl client code from GraphQL queries
  • elm-graphql (‚≠ê781) - Generate GraphQl client code from GraphQL schemas
  • HTML to Elm - Convert HTML to Elm Html. Useful when porting an app to Elm.
  • JSON Schema to Elm (‚≠ê90) - Generates Elm types, JSON decoders, JSON encoders and fuzz tests from JSON schema specifications
  • OpenApi Generator (‚≠ê24k) - Generate OpenApi types for Elm.
  • Quicktype (‚≠ê13k) - Generate JSON decoders and encoders from JSON
  • Travelm Agency (‚≠ê47) - Generate typesafe Elm code from translation files

Frameworks / Outdated Boilerplates

  • elm-spa - Framework for making single page apps in Elm.
  • Elm Land - A framework for building Elm applications.
  • Spades (‚≠ê299) - Start an Elm SPA ready to the real world.

Compile and bundle / Outdated Boilerplates

  • elm-compiler (‚≠ê7.7k) - The official Elm compiler.
  • elm-webpack-loader (‚≠ê534) - Webpack loader Elm.
  • Parcel - Bundle Elm using Parcel.
  • vite-plugin-elm (‚≠ê209) - Vite plugin for Elm.

Community and Support / Games

  • Slack - Elm slack community.

items.title: Awesome Appimage
items.content_text:
### AppImage consumption tools / Package managers

*   [Bread (‚≠ê38)](https://github.com/pegvin/bread) - Download, update, remove, and run AppImages from GitHub on the command line, and integrate apps into the desktop.
items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome Rails
items.content_text:
### Gems / Other external resources

*   [rails-mermaid\_erd (‚≠ê154)](https://github.com/koedame/rails-mermaid_erd) - A gem to interactively generate entity-relationship diagram in image or Markdown format. [:red\_circle:](https://rubygems.org/gems/rails-mermaid_erd)
items.content_html:
Gems / Other external resources

items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:
### Date and Time

*   [go-anytime (‚≠ê29)](https://github.com/ijt/go-anytime) - Parse dates/times like "next dec 22nd at 3pm" and ranges like "from today until next thursday" without knowing the format in advance.

### Distributed Systems

*   [Kitex (‚≠ê7.5k)](https://github.com/cloudwego/kitex) - A high-performance and strong-extensibility Golang RPC framework that helps developers build microservices. If the performance and extensibility are the main concerns when you develop microservices, Kitex can be a good choice.

### Embeddable Scripting Languages

*   [starlark-go (‚≠ê2.5k)](https://github.com/google/starlark-go) - Go implementation of Starlark: Python-like language with deterministic evaluation and hermetic execution.

### Tutorials / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

*   [Go in 7 days (‚≠ê154)](https://github.com/harrytran103/7_days_of_go) - Learn everything about Go in 7 days (from a Nodejs developer).
*   [W3basic Go Tutorials](https://www.w3basic.com/golang/) - W3Basic provides an in-depth tutorial and well-organized content to learn Golang programming.
items.content_html:
Date and Time

  • go-anytime (‚≠ê29) - Parse dates/times like "next dec 22nd at 3pm" and ranges like "from today until next thursday" without knowing the format in advance.

Distributed Systems

  • Kitex (‚≠ê7.5k) - A high-performance and strong-extensibility Golang RPC framework that helps developers build microservices. If the performance and extensibility are the main concerns when you develop microservices, Kitex can be a good choice.

Embeddable Scripting Languages

  • starlark-go (‚≠ê2.5k) - Go implementation of Starlark: Python-like language with deterministic evaluation and hermetic execution.

Tutorials / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

  • Go in 7 days (‚≠ê154) - Learn everything about Go in 7 days (from a Nodejs developer).
  • W3basic Go Tutorials - W3Basic provides an in-depth tutorial and well-organized content to learn Golang programming.
